application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: SPECIES	WORK PROPOSEDRear RHST1	Sycamore  (Acer pseudoplatanus) Reduce hight 1m above the previous reduction points 3.5-4m - Reduce lateral 	growth by 2.2.5m - Remove the two lowest branches which grow towards the garden	 - clean out the crown and remove dead wood.rear lhs closest to wallT2	Elder  (Sambucus nigra) Reduce the height by 2m -Cut back any overhang too the neighbouring garden back to the fence line - remove dead wood	 and stumps furthest from wallT3	Elder (Sambucus nigra) Reduce the height to match T1 - Remove the lowest limb growing towards the property - clean out the crown and dead woodTight against the rear wallT4	Ash  (Fraxinus excelsior) Fell to ground level and treat stump to prevent any further growth on wall behind T1T5	Ivy Common (Hedera helix)Hard trim back to the wall
